room_title: Escape room "Revolution Spies" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: The Revolution Spies room was really fun and challenging. It can't be done alone so bring a good team with you. It's theme fit perfect with the local history of Valley Forge and the Continental Army. It includes tradecraft from the era and mixes it with a little modern technology. I like the free group picture offered at the end that we can look back on.

room_title: Escape room "Revolution Spies" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: Such an awesome experience! The Revolutionary Spies room was great! Unfortunately we didn't escape, but we had so much fun trying to get out! I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Revolution Spies" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: This was such a fun experience! It proved to be both challenging and fun. My group did not escape the Revolutionary Spies Room, but we had so much fun that we are already discussing when our next visit will be. I would definitely recommend this place!
